LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxLabel_AssignMechOverlay: show assigned overlay for mechanoid spots
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxDesc_AssignMechOverlay: shows the name of the assigned mech on their mech spots.
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxLabel_UnassignMechOverlay: show unassigned overlay for mechanoid spots
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxDesc_UnassignMechOverlay: shows the unassigned label on unassigned mech spots.
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxDesc_MessageSpawner: Shows a message like vanilla spawner on neurofoam production
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxDesc_MessageBiocodeable: show a message on creation of biocodeable gear before pawns decide to just biocode them.
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxLabel_SinistreAllowedWitho: allow non-player sinistre to spawn without active monolith
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxDesc_SinistreAllowedWithou: doesn't change anything without the anomaly DLC.
LanguageData.AV_SettingsSliderDesc_HackingMaxBandwidt: this option just changes the bandwidth cost limit of the hacking lance, it wont allow hacking of boss mechs.
LanguageData.AV_SettingsSliderDesc_MechDrop_Neuroferi: chance for neuroferium mechanites to run wild when injested.
